div.div:
"Ready" instructional materials will be disbursed on the following dates: (Please be advised that the Governor's declaration does make exceptions for travel to and from educational institutions for the purposes of picking up and dropping off materials)
Times: 8:00 am -10:00 am at each school site.
1. Tuesday, April 21st
K, 6th, and 8th grades
2. Wednesday, April 22nd
1st, 5th, and 7th grades
3. Thursday, April 23rd
2nd and 4th grades
4. Friday, April 24th
3rd grade
K-8 yearbooks, report cards, and all personal items may be picked up on May 21 and May 22.

div.div: Senior Parents and Students- If you have not yet joined our LBHS Remind communication platform, please do so by texting @6a438g7 to 81010. We will be sending out important updates, deadlines, etc as we get them. Thank you!

p.a: Website Hosting Solution Powered by SchoolBlocks

div.h3:
Welcome to the SchoolBlocks
self-guided tour!
div.p: The most common question we receive is, how is SchoolBlocks inspired by Pinterest? SchoolBlocks eliminates navigation bars and uses a block style layout that’s similar to Pinterest. It creates a unique and engaging browsing experience, optimizes for mobile and removes a lot of navigational complexity.
Please click on the red plus signs found on this page to learn more about specific features.
